name: WORDLAND - Let's Travel
description:
Arrange the letters and answer the questions described at the bottom.
Very simple controls, left click to pick a piece up, mouse wheel to rotate in either direction, another left click to place.





Unlock the figures and customize your luggage, making it unique!




  • 50 sticks to collect
  • Designed for crosswords lovers;
  • Solve 50 puzzles carefully created;
  • Enjoy 23 beautiful landscapes;
  • Choose the level of difficulty that you want to face (Easy, Normal or Hard);
  • Original soundtrack, specially composed to help you keep your focus and concentration;
  • Everything in the game was made with a lot of love and craftsmanship;
